Name: The Revenge of Johnny Bonasera: Episode 4
About the game: Hilarious adventure game in cartoon style. This is the fourth episode of 'The revenge of Johnny Bonasera'. After hijacking the flying saucer from Hangar 19, Johnny gets to the alien base. In the alien base, Johnny will try to find the way to rescue his mother and all humans who have been abducted, including Capitán Wachimolete, who is now a member of the alien army due to a probe that controls his will. • 2D HD graphics in TV cartoon style. • A story driven adventure full of hilarious dialogues and puzzles. • Outlandish characters to talk, interact, beat...
